wikipedia_page.main: Huw Jenkins (24 October 1944 – 21 August 2013) was a Welsh cricketer active in 1970 who played for Glamorgan. He was born in Swansea and died in Clevedon. He appeared in one first-class match as a lefthanded batsman who bowled right arm medium pace. He scored 81 runs with a highest score of 65.

link_mentions.page: List of Glamorgan County Cricket Club players

response: * Huw Jenkins, 68, Welsh cricket player (Glamorgan).Huw Jenkins
